tool.name: Extract and annotate dbSNP and VCF file
tool.description: from a user defined region or whole file.

param.name: display_region
param.label: Extract records from this region
param.help: If you do not select this it will find the chromosome and region from your input file automatically

param.name: region
param.label: Type in region - Only if the box above is ticked
param.help: The format of the region is ref:start-end, where the and end coordinates are 1-based
